title: MET Gala Review: Chaotic Australian Edition
brief_description: Australian comedian Samantha Andrew takes to her Instagram account to review several of the red carpet looks at this year’s MET Gala. The 2022 “Gilded Glamour, White Tie” theme inspired Samantha Andrew to make rapid-fire comparisons to iconic Australian celebrities, experiences and objects.
description:
This video features in a responsive display in the museum that presents the moments, stories and memes capturing the zeitgeist by going viral on the internet.

Australian comedian Samantha Andrew takes to her Instagram account to review several of the red carpet looks at this year’s MET Gala. The 2022 “Gilded Glamour, White Tie” theme inspired Andrews to make rapid-fire comparisons to iconic Australian celebrities, experiences and objects.

The 2022 “Gilded Glamour, White Tie” theme inspired Andrews to make rapid-fire comparisons to iconic Australian celebrities, experiences and objects.
